data.oai_dc:dc: Metadata of studies examining reproductive traits before and after whole genome duplication

This dataset contains metadata collected from publications that were used for the analyses in our study. It includes information about the study species and measurements of traits before and after whole genome duplication.
assortative mating|floral phenotype|flower morphology|flowering phenology|meta-analysis|neopolyploidy|phenotype|polyploidy|reproductive output|whole genome duplication
